item.title: Tesla’s New Registrations For January Plummet In France and Norway – TSLA Stock Declines Over 2%
item.description: In France, new registrations fell 42% in January to 661 vehicles, while Norway saw an even steeper 88% decline.

item.title: President Trump Plans $12 Billion Critical Minerals Reserve To Cut Reliance On China: Report
item.description: According to a Bloomberg report, the initiative will create a centralized reserve of essential metals and minerals, including rare earths, to help shi...

item.title: DIS Stock Gains Pre-Market After Q1 Beat, Despite Profit Strain In Entertainment Unit
item.description: Adjusted earnings per share (EPS) of $1.63, narrowed YoY but beat the Street consensus of $1.58.

item.title: Bitcoin At $60,000? Traders And Analysts Say Peak Fear May Still Be Ahead

item.title: Polestar Stock Gains Pre-Market After Securing $400M Bank-Backed Financing
item.description: The automaker confirmed it secured $400 million through an equity financing split evenly between Feathertop Funding and Standard Chartered Bank.
